message: Let's split it 90/10, I think that's fair.  You get a nice chunk, and I get the majority. What do you say?
I'll give you a decent amount, but I think I deserve more since I'm making the offer. Take it or leave it!
Okay, I'll compromise.  Let's do a 60/40 split this time.  I'm willing to give you more, but I need to make sure I get a fair share as well.  What do you think?
I'm not sure why you're being so stubborn, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it, I'm not making another offer!
